Text: Based on the sample, this looks very good. Legitimate 5.1 sound and 720p quality! Thanks bunches!
Not all of the English subs are there, and some are too fast and unreadable unless you pause every time.  There are also audio distortion problems.

I watched the entire film from beginning to end, and did not notice any issues with the audio. The Dolby track on this file appears identical to that which came with the DVD screener copies that have been online for a couple of weeks. Can't comment on the subtitles, didn't need to use them, and the hardcoded ones appear to be just fine. Again, great job with this upload!
